text: is the form a HubSpot form created using the form tool?
and, if you were building this independent of the HubSpot CMS, how would you prefer to approach the problem?
when it comes to requests via a web browser, CORS does come into play, but I suspect that you are looking for a solution that would extend to requests made via other means like a script.

i will say that it is possible for a GET request to a serverless function to be made to request a signature that could then be used to verify the submission when the POST is made to a separate serverless function
i'll also add that we're discussing different ideas internally as well.
